title: Hello from Latinomads.com
description: Description will go into a meta tag in <head />

items.title: Easy to Use
items.description: Docusaurus was designed from the ground up to be easily installed and         used to get your website up and running quickly.

items.title: Focus on What Matters
items.description: Docusaurus lets you focus on your guides, and we'll do the chores. Go ahead and move your content into the content directory.

items.title: Powered by React
items.description: Extend or customize your website layout by reusing React. Docusaurus can         be extended while reusing the same header and footer.
